text: And the Believing males and the Believing females: some of them are auliya to some (others). They enjoin Al-Maâ€™ruf and forbid against Al-Munkar, and they establish the Salat and pay up the Zakat, and they obey Allah and His Messenger. Those people: soon shall Allah have Mercy over them. Surely Allah is All-Mighty, All-Wise
